description:
Takes any component and injects a tooltip when the user hovers
over the component or touch holds it on a mobile device. It also
injects the event listeners and a `tooltip` prop to be added to
the `ComposedComponent`.

If the `tooltipLabel` prop is omitted, the tooltip and event listeners will not
be included.

```js
@param {function} ComposedComponent the component to compose with the tooltip functionality.
@return {function} the ComposedComponent with a tooltip.
```

methods.name: getComposedComponent

tooltipPosition.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the `ComposedComponent`.

tooltipDelay.description:
An optional delay before the tooltip appears on hover or keyboard focus. The
touch tooltip will always appear at `687ms` (~ time for context menu).

onBlur.description: An optional function to call when the composed component triggers the `blur` event.

onKeyUp.description: An optional function to call when the composed component triggers the `keyup` event.

onMouseOver.description: An optional function to call when the composed component triggers the `mouseover` event.

onMouseLeave.description: An optional function to call when the composed component triggers the `mouseleave` event.

onTouchStart.description: An optional function to call when the composed component triggers the `touchstart` event.

onTouchEnd.description: An optional function to call when the composed component triggers the `touchend` event.
